label: Contact
comment: An individual human being in a position to give assistance or information.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the title of this contact person, such as Ms., Doctor, Mister.
The identifier of the residence country of this contact person.
A role, expressed as text, for this contact person.

objectProperties.comment: The exchange of thoughts, messages, or information, as universally exchanged by speech, signals, writing, or behaviour between persons and/or organizations.
